timeline.bodyText: We check isCausedByApiCallAttemptTimeout but can this be caused by the API call timer as well?
timeline.author: dagnir

replies.bodyText:
The timeout exception is caused while  ApiCallAttemptTimeoutExecute-Link and this is the same check which resets the interrupts
ApiCallAttemptTimeoutTrackingStageInterruptReset-Link.
API call timer  causes context.apiCallTimeoutTracker() while the one used above is
context.apiCallAttemptTimeoutTracker()
replies.author: joviegas

replies.bodyText: Okay gotcha, so if the API call timer fired (and not the attempt timer), then the exception would be AbortedException which we already handle.
replies.author: dagnir
